name: Salmon Dice Ball! - non GMTK ver
name_original: Salmon Dice Ball! - non GMTK ver
description:
Test version of Salmon Rice Ball for debugging. And post jam bug fix and development aha.

Note to self: Exported GLES2  HTML5 games needs powers of 2 sized textures. Else it won't show up. It will show up fine on debug, just not on the exported HTML5 game.
